name: Harry
impression: Love to shop here. They have the best prices of anyone around. I would recommend and I do, Drinksology to everyone!

name: Alec
impression: Drinksology always seems to have the best pricing in town and have a huge selection. You go in looking to buy one thing and come out with five!

name: Sarah
impression: Exactly what you expect: a warehouse full of almost every possible alcohol you could possibly need.

name: Donald
impression: Absolutely hands down the best prices and selection. Literally the only place I buy alcohol.
